statements: SELECT * FROM retirement_accounts
SELECT client_id, account_balance FROM retirement_accounts
SELECT account_balance, growth_rate FROM retirement_accounts
SELECT * FROM retirement_accounts WHERE client_id = 1
SELECT client_id, account_balance, growth_rate FROM retirement_accounts ORDER BY account_balance DESC
SELECT * FROM retirement_accounts WHERE client_id = 100;
SELECT client_id, account_balance, growth_rate FROM retirement_accounts WHERE account_balance > 50000;
SELECT client_id, account_balance FROM retirement_accounts WHERE growth_rate BETWEEN 0.05 AND 0.1 ORDER BY account_balance DESC;
SELECT client_id, account_balance, growth_rate FROM retirement_accounts ORDER BY growth_rate ASC, account_balance DESC;
SELECT AVG(account_balance) AS average_balance, MAX(account_balance) AS max_balance FROM retirement_accounts;
SELECT * FROM retirement_accounts;
SELECT client_name, balance FROM retirement_accounts WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT account_id, client_name, balance FROM retirement_accounts ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT account_id, client_name, balance, growth_rate FROM retirement_accounts INNER JOIN growth_rates ON retirement_accounts.account_id = growth_rates.account_id;
SELECT * FROM growth_rates WHERE effective_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM retirement_accounts;
SELECT account_id, client_name FROM retirement_accounts ORDER BY account_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM retirement_accounts WHERE balance > 5000;
SELECT account_id, balance FROM retirement_accounts WHERE client_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT AVG(growth_rate) AS avg_growth_rate FROM growth_rates;
SELECT client_id, balance, growth_rate FROM retirement_accounts WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT client_name, city FROM clients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT rate, description FROM growth_rates WHERE rate > 0.05;
SELECT client_id, balance, growth_rate FROM retirement_accounts ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT client_name, age, city FROM clients WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM retirement_accounts WHERE balance > 10000 ORDER BY growth_rate DESC;
SELECT client_name, age FROM clients WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT client_id, rate, description FROM growth_rates WHERE rate < 0.05 AND description LIKE '%high%';
SELECT client_name, city FROM clients WHERE age >= 65 OR city = 'Los Angeles' ORDER BY client_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM retirement_accounts WHERE balance BETWEEN 5000 AND 15000 ORDER BY client_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM client_accounts;
SELECT client_id, account_balance, growth_rate FROM client_accounts ORDER BY account_balance DESC;
SELECT client_id, date_of_birth, address FROM client_info WHERE client_id = 'C001';
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM account_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Credit' LIMIT 10;
SELECT client_id, growth_rate FROM growth_rate_history WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY growth_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM client_accounts WHERE account_balance > 1000 ORDER BY account_balance DESC;
SELECT client_id, full_name, date_of_birth FROM client_info WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT MAX(amount) AS max_transaction_amount, AVG(amount) AS avg_transaction_amount FROM account_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'credit';
SELECT client_id, AVG(growth_rate) AS avg_growth_rate FROM growth_rate_history GROUP BY client_id HAVING AVG(growth_rate) > 5;
SELECT c.client_id, a.transaction_date, a.amount, a.transaction_type FROM account_transactions a JOIN client_accounts c ON a.client_id = c.client_id WHERE a.amount > c.account_balance;
SELECT * FROM ClientAccounts;
SELECT client_id, account_balance FROM ClientAccounts ORDER BY account_balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM ClientInfo WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM ClientInfo WHERE first_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT client_id, SUM(investment_amount) AS total_investment FROM InvestmentHistory GROUP BY client_id HAVING total_investment > 10000;
SELECT * FROM ClientAccounts ORDER BY account_balance DESC, growth_rate ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT client_id, first_name, last_name FROM ClientInfo WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01' ORDER BY last_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT client_id, SUM(investment_amount) AS total_investment FROM InvestmentHistory GROUP BY client_id HAVING total_investment > 50000;
SELECT client_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM TransactionLogs WHERE transaction_type = 'Deposit' GROUP BY client_id ORDER BY transaction_count DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT(alert_type) FROM AccountAlerts WHERE alert_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
